ai-mil7.7.3:1.1_0: “After doing so, you’ll remember any one of the drums or the barber?”
ai-mil7.7.3:1.2_0: “Great king, the water in the forest grove, which of water, was confused, and avoided the water three life.
ai-mil7.7.3:1.3_0: In the same way, when anyone who lives negligently and who keeps negligence, they’re lost in negligence, and they mixednerated by diligence.
ai-mil7.7.3:1.4_0: But because of that fear of that peril, that doesn’t decline in the presence of extinguishment.
ai-mil7.7.3:1.5_0: This is the one factor of Citta.
ai-mil7.7.3:1.6_0: When the Buddha has spoken, the gods of the teaching liked
ai-mil7.7.3:2.4_0: and has drawn near to extinguishment.’”
ai-mil7.7.3:3.1_0: a fourth part of the body is frankincense,
